name: IOBluetoothServiceBrowserController
desc: A NSWindowController subclass to display a window to search for and perform SDP queries on bluetooth devices within range.

items.name: init!(IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerOptions)
items.desc: Allocator work Bluetooth Service Browser window controller.

items.name: func addAllowedUUID(IOBluetoothSDPUUID!)
items.desc: Adds a UUID to the list of UUIDs that are used to validate the user's selection.

items.name: func addAllowedUUIDArray([Any]!)
items.desc: Adds an array of UUIDs to the list of UUIDs that are used to validate the user's selection.

items.name: func beginSheetModal(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!) -> IOReturn
items.desc: Runs the service browser panel as a sheet on the target window.

items.name: func clearAllowedUUIDs()
items.desc: Resets the controller back to the default state where it will accept any device the user selects.

items.name: func getDescriptionText() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the description text that appears in the device selector panel.

items.name: func getOptions() -> IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerOptions
items.desc: Returns the option bits that control the panel's behavior.

items.name: func getPrompt() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the title of the default/select button in the device selector panel.

items.name: func getResults() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns the result of the user's selection.

items.name: func getSearchAttributes() -> UnsafePointer<IOBluetoothDeviceSearchAttributes>!
items.desc: Returns the search attributes that control the panel's search/inquiry behavior.

items.name: func getRef() -> Unmanaged<IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerRef>!
items.desc: Returns an IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerRef representation of the target IOBluetoothServiceBrowserController object.

items.name: func getTitle() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the title of the device selector panel.

items.name: func runModal() -> Int32
items.desc: Runs the service browser panel in a modal session to allow the user to select a service on a Bluetooth device.

items.name: func setDescriptionText(String!)
items.desc: Sets the description text that appears in the device selector panel.

items.name: func setOptions(IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerOptions)
items.desc: Modify the options for the window controller.

items.name: func setPrompt(String!)
items.desc: Sets the title of the default/select button in the device selector panel.

items.name: func setSearchAttributes(UnsafePointer<IOBluetoothDeviceSearchAttributes>!)
items.desc: Sets the search attributes that control the panel's search/inquiry behavior.

items.name: func setTitle(String!)
items.desc: Sets the title of the panel when not run as a sheet.

items.name: class func withServiceBrowserControllerRef(IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerRef!) -> IOBluetoothServiceBrowserController!
items.desc: Method call to convert an IOBluetoothServiceBrowserControllerRef into an IOBluetoothServiceBrowserController *.
